name: Joseph M. SCOTT et al., Appellants v. PALMERTON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT
name_abbreviation: Scott v. Palmerton Area School District

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: Joseph M. SCOTT et al., Appellants v. PALMERTON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
466 A.2d 1029
Joseph M. SCOTT et al., Appellants v. PALMERTON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 18, 1983.
Decided Nov. 2, 1983.
Gary F. Dobias, Jim Thorpe, for appellants.
James A. Wimmer, Palmertown, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
